name: Floaty's Music Booth Mini
description:
This version is scratch exclusive but is now ported to Itch.io! 

this version is not what you would expect out of versions like Plus or Remake this is compressed and optimized for scratch this is for the base demo version only!

If you wish to play the latest version play it in the link below! 

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/728475640/
